description: 1. Support 64/128-bit WEP, complies with 128 bit WPA standard(TKIP/AES), supports MIC, IV Expansion, Shared Key Authentication, IEEE 802.1X 2. supports 150/54/48/36/24/18/12/9/6/11/5.5/2/1 Mbps wireless LAN data transfer rates 3. Quick Secure Setup, complies with WPS for worry free wireless security 4. Simple Configuration and monitoring 5. Supports Roaming technology, guaranteeing efficient wireless connections. 6. Supports Windows /XP/Vista/Windows 7/Mac/Linux 7. With internal Antenna
title: Importer520 WiFi Wireless IEEE 802.11N/G/B WLAN 150Mbps Network Adapter USB2.0 Wireless Lan USB Adapter for Laptop Noteook Desktop PC Suport Vista/Windows 7(32bit & 64bit)/Linux
